name: GBU-31(V)4/B
description:
The GBU-31(V)4/B is a BLU-109 hardened penetration bomb equipped with a JDAM guidance kit, used by the USN/USMC.

The Joint Direct Attack Munition (JDAM) is a guidance kit that converts unguided bombs, or "dumb bombs", into all-weather precision-guided munitions. JDAM-equipped bombs are guided by an integrated inertial guidance system coupled to a Global Positioning System receiver.
